trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> class is a read-only collection generated as a response to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> object that contains zero, or more, objects derived from <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> è una raccolta di sola lettura generata in risposta a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> che contiene zero o più oggetti derivati da <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <c>value</c> where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero di <c>value</c> in cui ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.CopyTo(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse[],System.Int32)" /> method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.CopyTo(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse[],System.Int32)" /> copia l'intero insieme in una matrice unidimensionale, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="i" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="i" /> è minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is multidimensional
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è multidimensionale

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> is greater than the available space from *i* to the end of the destination <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> di origine è maggiore dello spazio disponibile da *i* alla fine dell'oggetto <paramref name="value" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile eseguire il cast automatico del tipo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> di origine al tipo dell'oggetto <paramref name="value" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.Count" /> property contains the number of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.Count" /> contiene il numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il numero degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.GetEnumerator" /> method returns an enumerator for the entire <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.GetEnumerator" /> restituisce un enumeratore per l'intero insieme <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object for the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> per l'intero insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.IsErrorResponse" /> property specifies whether an error response has occurred.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.IsErrorResponse" /> specifica se si è verificata una risposta di errore.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if an error response has occurred; <see langword="false" />, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è <see langword="true" /> se si è verificata una risposta di errore; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.IsOperationError" /> property specifies whether an operation error response has occurred.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.IsOperationError" /> specifica se si è verificata una risposta di errore delle operazioni.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if an operation error has occurred; <see langword="false" />, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è <see langword="true" /> se si è verificato un errore delle operazioni; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.IsSynchronized" /> property contains a value that indicates whether access to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.IsSynchronized" /> contiene un valore che indica se l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> is synchronized (thread-safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe); in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index value at which the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object is found.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale si trova l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.Item(System.Int32)" /> property contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.Item(System.Int32)" /> contiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.RequestId" /> property contains the RequestID associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.RequestId" /> contiene l'ID richiesta associato al documento.

trans-unit.source: The RequestID associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: ID richiesta associato al documento.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only and throws an exception if you attempt to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura e genera un'eccezione se si tenta di impostare il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: You attempted to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: Si è tentato di impostare il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.SyncRoot" /> property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.SyncRoot" /> contiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument> using the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Classi derivate possono fornire versioni sincronizzate del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument> utilizzando il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.SyncRoot%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.SyncRoot%2A> of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>, not directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Il codice di sincronizzazione è necessario eseguire operazioni sul <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.SyncRoot%2A> del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>, non direttamente sul <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>.

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo si garantisce il corretto funzionamento delle raccolte derivate da altri oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, viene mantenuta la sincronizzazione con altri thread che potrebbero modificare contemporaneamente il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <c>value</c> where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero di <c>value</c> in cui ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> method copies the entire <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> copia l'intero insieme <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> in una matrice unidimensionale, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.Count" /> property gets the number of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.Count" /> ottiene il numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" /> property gets a value that indicates whether access to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" /> ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> is synchronized (thread-safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe); in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" /> property gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" /> ottiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.ToXml" /> method transforms each <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object in the collection into an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.ToXml" /> trasforma ogni oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> nell'insieme in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> trasformato.
